example.name: autogen1
example.text: they can spend the next three or four or five or six years of their life bringing about the most difficult and costly modernization of an information system on the civil side ever
example.arg: of an information system on the civil side

example.name: autogen2
example.text: the modernization of a pulp and newsprint mill in Alabama
example.arg: of a pulp and newsprint mill in Alabama
